questions.question: What does a red traffic light signal mean?
questions.explanation: A red light always means stop.

questions.question: What does a yellow diamond-shaped sign indicate?
questions.explanation: Yellow diamond signs are used to warn drivers about upcoming road conditions and hazards.

questions.question: In North Dakota, who has the right-of-way at an intersection where two drivers arrive at the same time?
options: The driver who is going straight
questions.explanation: At intersections, the driver on the right has the right-of-way.

questions.question: What is the maximum speed limit on rural interstate highways in North Dakota?
questions.explanation: The maximum speed limit on rural interstate highways in North Dakota is 75 mph.

questions.question: Where should you park when you leave your vehicle unattended?
questions.explanation: Always park in a designated parking space and make sure it's legal to park there.

questions.question: What should you do when you approach a flashing red traffic light?
options: Slow down and proceed with caution
Speed up and cross the intersection
questions.explanation: A flashing red light means the same as a stop sign: Stop, yield the right-of-way, and go when it is safe.

questions.question: What is the school zone speed limit in North Dakota?
questions.explanation: The speed limit in school zones in North Dakota is 20 mph.

questions.question: When can you park in a handicapped parking space?
options: When the space is not being used
When you are picking up a handicapped person
When you have a handicapped placard or license plate
questions.correctAnswer: When you have a handicapped placard or license plate
questions.explanation: Only vehicles with a handicapped placard or license plate can park in handicapped parking spaces.

questions.question: What should you do if you are driving in fog?
options: Decrease your speed and use low beam headlights
Continue driving at the same speed
questions.correctAnswer: Decrease your speed and use low beam headlights
questions.explanation: In fog, decrease your speed and use your low beam headlights for better visibility.

questions.question: What does a yellow traffic light signal mean?
options: Stop if it is safe to do so
Speed up to beat the red light
questions.correctAnswer: Stop if it is safe to do so
questions.explanation: A yellow traffic light means caution, the signal is about to change to red. If you haven't already entered the intersection, you should stop if it is safe to do so.
